_comments.description: Configuration file for Excel Search and Update Processor
_comments.usage: 1. Copy this file to config.json, 2. Edit the values below, 3. Run excel_processor.py

general_settings.enable_backups: Set to true to create backups before processing
general_settings.max_rows_to_process: Maximum number of rows to process per sheet (improves performance)
general_settings.process_delay_seconds: Delay in seconds between processing files

folder_paths.note: Set the folder path for your operating system. The script will automatically use the correct one.

search_and_update_rules.name: Descriptive name for this rule (used in logs)
search_and_update_rules.sheet_name: Exact name of the Excel sheet to process
search_and_update_rules.search_column: Column letter to search for the value (A, B, C, ... Z, AA, AB, etc.)
search_and_update_rules.search_value: The value to search for in the search_column
search_and_update_rules.update_column: Column letter to update when a match is found
search_and_update_rules.target_value: The desired value. Cell will be updated only if it differs from this.
search_and_update_rules.enabled: Set to false to skip this rule without deleting it
